bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'stats'; [ {label: 'IDS_CLUB_BATTLES_COUNT', rate: 'no_rate', count: battlesCount}, {label: 'IDS_VICTORIES' , rate: winRate, count: winCount}, {label: 'IDS_DRAWS' , rate: drawRate, count: drawCount}, {label: 'IDS_DEFEATS' , rate: loseRate, count: loseCount}]

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {scaleY: 0.5, scaleX: 0.5, ubScaleY: 0.5, ubScaleX: 0.5, alpha: 0, top: 10}; {scaleY: 1, scaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==0; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==0 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==1; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==1 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==2; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==2 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: var
eventSequence
bind.value: isChangeLeague ? isLuckyBattle ? sequenceLeagueUp : sequenceLeagueDown : sequenceCurLeague; 'animationStepFinished'; 'allAnimationFinishedEvent'; true

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'ClubHeaderIcon'; { _clubIconState : 'RatingCounter', _animParams : { startRatingValue : params[$index].startRating, endRatingValue : params[$index].endRating, index : $index, valueChangeIcon : ((params[0].endRating - params[0].startRating) > 0) ? 'up' : ((params[0].endRating - params[0].startRating) < 0) ? 'down' : 'euqal'}, _fakeLeague : params[$index].league, _isLeader : $root.isLeader, _isActiveClubIcon : true, _leagueState : startIssueAnimation ? 'animation' : params[$index].leagueState}

bind.name: appear
bind.value: ('CountPoints_'+_animParams.index); 0.25; 0; {top: -15, left: -70, scaleX: 1.7, scaleY: 1.7, alpha: 0}; {top: 0, left: 0, scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, alpha: 1}; 0
